pageContext.claim: “In fact, last night -- you don't read about this too much, but it was approved -- $1.6 billion for the phase one of the wall, which is not only design but the start of construction over a period of about two years, but the start of construction for a great border wall. And we're going to build it.”
pageContext.analysis: The House Appropriations Committee included $1.6 billion for border wall construction, but it has not yet been approved. Moreover, Trump's key campaign promise was that he would build a wall and make Mexico pay for it -- but this funding, if approved, would come out of U.S. taxpayer funds.
